email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, we were hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position on the freight rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the vessel’s specifications. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable. However, we’d like to request a slight adjustment to the laycan to 16-21 October to better align with our loading schedule. Also, could you confirm the cargo size capacity? Best regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, glad to hear the rate works for you. I’ve confirmed with the owner, and the laycan can be adjusted to 16-21 October. The cargo size capacity is 140,000 metric tons. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good on our end. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $50.00 per metric ton, laycan 16-21 October, and demurrage at $15,000 per day. Please send over the charter party for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll have the charter party drafted and sent over to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to finalizing this deal. Best regards, Sarah
